headline: Is There an Opportunity in Darden Restaurants After Shares Slide 13% in Recent Weeks?
summary: If you are trying to make sense of Darden Restaurants’ recent stock performance, you are definitely not alone. For anyone who has watched this industry leader serve up years of growth, the past month or so may look like a curveball: Darden’s shares have dipped 4.3% in the last week and dropped 13.0% over the last 30 days. But step back, and that short-term spill stands out against a five-year gain of over 124.2% and a healthy 21.5% jump in the past year. Clearly, there is still appetite for...

headline: Smaller Budgets, Shifting Eating Patterns Are Leading Many Restaurants To Reconsider Portion Sizes
summary: Olive Garden may have made a name for itself with its unlimited pasta and breadsticks deals, but the restaurant is now among a growing number that are hoping to revitalize profits by scaling back on portion sizes and lowering costs. Over the last few months, Olive Garden has been testing a lighter portion section of its menu. The menu, which is currently offered at 40% of its locations, features seven of its famous entrees in smaller amounts and at lower prices, along with traditional unlimited
